commentary: The "Bluh" panel, a clear callback to when Rose tried sipping her mom's drink, sets up Kanaya's "evolving" taste for blood, which parallels Rose's "evolving" taste for alcohol. (By which I mean, later they're both hella into it.) Since I'm on the subject of Rose and her evolving tastes, consider this Funny Fact: for someone with such serious mother issues, Rose sure did end up falling for a literal mother-themed character.
